alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Brown; Nicollet (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 9:16PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At New Ulm. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 PM CDT Sunday, the stage was 798.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 803.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 800.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 804.2 feet on 09/29/2010. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
